page.title: 11LOCAL NEWS
page.content: Duddon Inshore Rescue (1985) The Duddon Inshore Rescue held their dance on 30th March. It was a great success, with Â£160 raised. They are hoping to hold another dance sometime in September. Plans have been approved for the new look-out extension and work on the foundation has already begun. On May 24th a Beach Barbecue was held in conjuction with a disco at the Boathouse. Food was provided by the Resident Chef,"Gilly". The money raised on this occasion was donated to the Duddon Inshore Rescue. ***** New Local Rescue Craft (1985) Haverigg Rescue officially launched their new boat on 5th May. This, no doubt will work with full cooperation with the Duddon Group in the future.
